bibl.note: Diss. Univ. London, 2005. - See in part. pp. 144; - 163-166 and pll. IIA-B: Dictys, T 6 [P.S.I. XII, 1286 (= M.-P.3 454.4; LDAB 922), fr. B].

München - Leipzig, K.G. Saur, 2006, 8°, xxi-290 pp. et 3 pll. ISBN 978-3-598-77840-7. €88.
